title: Revenue share by geographic region of delivery for Christian Dior December 2018
summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Revenue share in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Revenue share 29.0 is found at Country Asia (excluding Japan) and the minimum is found at Japan where Country is 7.0.
There is a difference of 22.0 between the maximum Country Asia (excluding Japan) and minimum Country Japan.
min_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Revenue share in each Country on the y axis.
Country Asia (excluding Japan) has the highest Revenue share and Japan has the lowest Revenue share.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Revenue share in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Revenue share 29.0 is found at Country Asia (excluding Japan) and the minimum is found at Japan where Country is 7.0.
There is a difference of 22.0 between the maximum Country Asia (excluding Japan) and minimum Country Japan.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue share for 6 number of Countrys.
The Revenue share is highest at Country Asia (excluding Japan) and lowest at Country Japan.
There is a difference of 22.0 between the maximum Country Asia (excluding Japan) and minimum Country Japan.
Country Asia (excluding Japan) is higher than any other Countrys with value 29.0, followed by United States, and Europe (excluding France). Down to Country Japan with the lowest value 7.0.
The Country Japan has 1.74 times less Revenue share than average.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 100.0.
